name: Linyi
title: Linyi - Traveling China
heroSubtitle: A prefecture-level city in southern Shandong province, is a place where ancient history and modern dynamism converge.
overview: Linyi, a prefecture-level city in southern Shandong province, is a place where ancient history and modern dynamism converge. Known as the 'City of Calligraphy' and the hometown of the sage Wang Xizhi, Linyi boasts a rich cultural heritage. Today, it is a major center for trade and logistics in eastern China, with a rapidly growing economy. The city's landscape is graced by the Yi and Shu rivers, offering scenic beauty alongside urban development.

highlights.attractions: Wang Xizhi's Former Residence, Mengshan Mountain National Forest Park, Linyi Trade City
highlights.cuisine: Shandong Pancake (Jianbing), Braised Pork in Brown Sauce, Linyi Pancake

dishes.name: Shandong Pancake (Jianbing)
dishes.description: A savory crepe made from grain flour, often filled with egg, crispy crackers, and scallions.

dishes.name: Braised Pork in Brown Sauce
dishes.description: A classic Chinese dish, slow-cooked to perfection with a rich, savory, and slightly sweet flavor.

gettingThere: By Air: Linyi Shubuling Airport (LYI) connects the city to major domestic destinations.
gettingAround: By Train: High-speed and conventional trains link Linyi to the national rail network.
Public Transit: An extensive bus system makes it easy and affordable to travel within the city.
